alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Knox; Morrow; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Richland, south central Ashland, southeastern Morrow, northwestern Holmes and Knox Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 619 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fredericktown to 8 miles southeast of Gambier. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mount Vernon, Loudonville, Fredericktown, Gambier, Bellville, Danville, Chesterville, Sparta, Waterford, Butler, Perrysville, Gann, North Liberty and Bladensburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
